sentences.en: A proportion of the pretax profit is set aside for contingency.
sentences.cn: 一部分税前利润留出供急用.

sentences.en: Dobbs The company earmarks 1 percent of the previous year's pretax profits to give to charity.
sentences.cn: 道伯斯该公司把去年税前利润的1%专门划拨给慈善事业.

sentences.en: If applicable, the revenue and pretax profit or loss reported in discontinued operations.
sentences.cn: 如果可适用, 收入和扣除税捐前的利润或损失在停止的操作方面.
税前利润几乎涨到了原来的12倍。

sentences.en: The dividend pay be equivalent to one quarter of the pretax profit.
sentences.cn: 所付股息相当于税前利润的四分之一.

sentences.en: They announced a fall in pretax profits.
sentences.cn: 他们宣布了税前利润的下降。

trans.tran_en: Pretax profits or losses are the total profits or losses made by a company before tax has been taken away
